topic.title: Sample Code
topic.shortdesc: The Python SDK now lets you create users, assign them roles and associated privileges, and remove them from the system.

section.title: User-Management APIs
section.p: Users who have been assigned the Admin role for the cluster are able to create, edit, and remove users. The Python SDK provides APIs to support these activities. A high-level summary of the APIs can be found in User-Management.
